list.title: App
list.description: App's component to manage various routes and display corresponding pages components

list.title: Error
list.description:
Component that displays the 404 Not Found Error
No props

list.title: Footer
list.description:
Component that displays the Footer
No props

list.title: Header
list.description:
Component that displays the header (logo and main top navbar menu)
No props

list.title: Home
list.description:
Component/page that displays the Home page
No props

list.title: Layout
list.description:
Component that displays the container layout
No props

list.title: Login
list.description:
Component that displays the Login page and set the authorization.
No props

list.title: Logout
list.description:
Component that displays the Logout page and remove the authorization infos from the state and the locastorage
No props

list.title: Profile
list.description: Component/page that displays the Profile page No props

list.title: RefreshAuthState
list.description:
Component that refresh the state.auth.token depending on the localstorage token status.
No props

list.title: RequireAuth
list.description:
Component that controls the authorization status.
Route to unauthorized page if authentification invalid.
No props

list.title: Unauthorized
list.description:
Component that displays the "unauthorized" page"
No props

list.title: UserAccounts
list.description:
Component that displays the user accounts information.
No props

list.title: UserWelcome
list.description:
Component/page that displays the header of the profile page.
This header contains the functionnality to edit user name.
It is called by the Profile component. No props

list.title: apiSlice
list.description:
File : apiSlice.js
It is used by RTK Query
Defines Base query using axios instance

list.title: authApiSlice
list.description:
File : authApiSlice.js
It is used by redux as a state management provider
Defines the authorization profile api endpoints

list.title: authSlice
list.description:
File : authSlice.js
It is used by redux as a state management provider
Defines the authorization profile slices

list.title: axios
list.description:
File : axios.js
Defines defautl axios instance

list.title: index
list.description:
File : index.jsx
Entry point of the app
Creates the state provider and renders the React components

list.title: store
list.description:
File : store.js
Store used by redux as a state management provider
Defines the store

list.title: userApiSlice
list.description:
File : userApiSlice.js
It is used by redux as a state management provider
Defines the user profile api endpoints

list.title: userSlice
list.description:
File : userSlice.js
It is used by redux as a state management provider
Defines the user profile slices
